result.html: Réitigh mé dinnéarI prepared dinner.
result.ponchtml: Réitiġ mé dinnéarI prepared dinner.

result.eng: Would you like to come to dinner with me tonight?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat teacht le haghaidh dinnéir liom

result.html: Ar mhaith leat teacht le haghaidh dinnéir liomWould you like to come to dinner with me tonight?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat teaċt le haġaiḋ dinnéir liomWould you like to come to dinner with me tonight?

result.eng: Would you like to have dinner with me?

result.eng: I eat my dinner between seven and eight.
result.ga: Ithim mo dhinnéar idir a seacht agus a hocht

result.ponchtml: Iṫim mo ḋinnéar idir a seaċt agus a hoċtI eat my dinner between seven and eight.

result.eng: What time do you eat your dinner?
result.ga: Cén t-am a itheann tú do dhinnéar

result.eng: Do you have dinner at home?

result.ponchtml: An mbíonn dinnéar agat sa ḃaileDo you have dinner at home?

result.eng: Sometimes I have dinner in a restaurant with my friends.
